version_description:
Everything! Discover all new features and the new graphic interface!

As always, we ask you to report any BUG via email to support@passion4profession.net, before leaving any negative reviews. We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

P4P Team

Following your suggestions, we have lengthened the time needed for getting into position between one exercise and another during training.

We have added a new feature that allows you to choose the suggested load weight for exercises with dumbbells and barbells.

As always, we ask you to report any BUG via email to support@passion4profession.net, before leaving any negative reviews. We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

P4P Team

For the first time ever, we are introducing the P4P Cloud!

- Save your progress and custom workouts in the cloud so that you never lose your data.
- Synchronize your P4P data across all your iOS devices

As always, we ask you to report any BUG via email to support@passion4profession.net, before leaving any negative reviews. We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

P4P Team

- Added Google sign in support. Login with your Google account and save all your workouts and progress in the P4P Cloud!
- Workout programs will now also use the device's calendar to store the schedule

As always, we ask you to report any BUG via email to support@passion4profession.net, before leaving any negative reviews. We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

P4P Team

- Minor BUGS fixed

As always, we ask you to report any BUG via email to support@passion4profession.net, before leaving any negative reviews. We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

P4P Team

Great news! FREE WEEKLY WORKOUT: Each week, a workout that's always new and free. It's impossible to be bored!

As always, we ask you to report any BUG via email to support@passion4profession.net, before leaving any negative reviews. We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

P4P Team

- Every Monday a workout always NEW and FREE!
- Added "Today" widget so you can quickly access your workout program
- Added app 3d touch so you can start working out even quicker!

As always, we ask you to report any BUG via email to support@passion4profession.net, before leaving any negative reviews. We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

P4P Team

- Added calorie counter in workout player - know exactly how many calories you burn while performing the exercises!
- Every Monday a workout always NEW and FREE!
- Added "Today" widget so you can quickly access your workout program
- Added app 3d touch so you can start working out even quicker!

As always, we ask you to report any BUG via email to support@passion4profession.net, before leaving any negative reviews. We will be happy to reply as quickly as possible and fix any BUG that you report to us. We work hard to give you the best product possible, because working out should be a pleasure ;-)

P4P Team

- With a view to the summer, we have unblocked the ideal workout in order to put you in shape before the summer and made it free for everyone!
- We have reduced the advertising to give users a better experience.
- Added integration with the “Under Armour” heart-rate monitor!
- Minor BUGS fixed

- 改善用户界面

- 修复了小漏洞

像往常一样，我们请求您在留下任何负面评论前，将任何漏洞情况通过发送电子邮件至support@passion4profession.net向我们报告。我们会尽力为您提供最佳产品，因为锻炼应该是一件令人愉悦的事情;-)
